scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.deploy: npm run build:client && npm run build:admin && if exist client\dist\admin (rmdir /s /q client\dist\admin) && mkdir client\dist\admin && xcopy /E /Y admin\dist client\dist\admin && cd client && npm run deploy
